context_of_use: The admin manages inventory levels to ensure products remain in stock.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
description: Maintain inventory levels and update stock to prevent stockouts.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to manage inventory.
postconditions: Stock status is accurate and reflects current availability.
assumptions: The admin has access to the inventory management interface.
The system has a mechanism to track inventory levels.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the admin to manage inventory levels.
The system shall prevent stockouts by updating inventory.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on how inventory levels are tracked and updated.
main_flow: 1. Admin initiates inventory management → System displays current inventory levels.
2. Admin updates inventory levels → System saves the updated inventory data.
3. Admin confirms changes → System reflects updated stock status.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the system fails to save the updated inventory data, then the system displays an error message and prompts the admin to retry.
